attributes.additional_details: VERY URGENT. Fulham Legal Aid Centre in London SW6  has had its grants withdrawn and so will have to close in June if funding is not found. This will leave the residents of the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham – a large area of London – and residents of a wider area of West London, who cannot afford lawyers, without any hope of legal representation now that legal aid is to a large extent nonexistent due to legal aid changes. Please help us keep this invaluable and long-established legal aid centre open. It is doing work that no one else does. Please help NOW if it is to stay open.
